tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.impl

Class FrameAncestorsDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractCSPDirective
      • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.impl.FrameAncestorsDirective

  • public class FrameAncestorsDirective
extends AbstractCSPDirective
    From https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Content_Security_Policy_Cheat_Sheet}
    The frame-ancestors directive indicates whether the user agent should allow embedding the resource using a frame, iframe, object, embed or applet element, or equivalent functionality in non-HTML resources. See http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/#directive-base-uri
    Author:
    Chris Smith
